Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level   Y is your Influence Roll
Top Ability Rules: Exhaust a card. Add Y to each Defense or Attack Value you roll.
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: You may choose and Exhaust X of your cards from Discard
Bottom Ability Rules: Spend X to perform the following:     1) Add 25 feet to your movement.    3) Attack a Target enemy. They cannot roll a Defense Value for this attack.    5) Take an additional turn after this one.

Top Ability Rules: This can be the only action you play this turn. At start of your next turn recover all discarded cards, heal up to X Health, and choose and play an Action from your Hand.
Bottom Ability Rules: Attack the Target at the start of your next turn if Able.

Top Ability Rules: Add X to the Attack Value. If you deal damage then you may attack the Target again. The Target cannot use movement on their next turn.
Bottom Ability Rules: If your attack dealt damage then you may choose to destroy one of their equipped weapons, lose X life and then Exhuast this card.

Top Ability Rules: Lose X life. Take an extra turn after your turn ends and then lose X life again. After taking your next turn you must then skip the following turn.
Bottom Ability Rules: Perform up to X non-action abilities and then lose 1 life for each one taken.

Top Ability Rules: Decide, layout, and expose the actions for your next turn. Everyone/everything around you knows your next turn. Recover up to X life, return up to X cards from discard, and add X to your next roll.
Bottom Ability Rules: During the next round you may play your actions at any point after anything has played an action. At the end of that round if you have not played all of your actions then you may then play your remaining actions.

Top Ability Rules: Target area that is 5 feet by 5 feet. All Enemies in and adjacent to that area cannot move more than 5 feet at a time. They may choose to use an action to take an Influence Roll against you and if they succeed they may ignore this affect.
Bottom Ability Rules: Target an area that is 5 feet by 5 feet. Enemies cannot move onto or adjacent to the targetted area. They may choose to take an action to Roll Influence against you. If they succeed they may ignore this affect.

Top Ability Rules: Target a 5 foot by 5 foot area within 45 feet and jump to that location.
Bottom Ability Rules: Choose a Target within 45 feet and pull them adjacent to you.

Top Ability Rules: If you and the Target attack the same enemy then return this card to your hand and both you and the Target may return one card from discard.
Bottom Ability Rules: If the Target heals or buffs you then add X to that value.

Top Ability Rules: Choose a target within 15 feet. They may move to your location. Each of you may now move up to 10 feet.
Bottom Ability Rules: Copy the Targets next action. After their turn ends perform that Action if you are able to.

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Influence Roll   Y is your Level
Top Ability Rules: Create a summon on a 5 foot by 5 foot space. It has a range of 45 and an attack value of (X + Y). It's health is equal to your health at the time of casting. Discard a card.
Bottom Ability Rules: Swap places with the Target. Gain 15 feet of movement.

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is the current Health of the Target
Top Ability Rules: Destroy the Target. Heal up to X life. Return two cards from discard.
Bottom Ability Rules: Heal the Target up to X life.

Top Ability Rules: Teleport a willing Target to a 5 foot by 5 foot surface. If the Target is an unwilling Enemy you must succeed an Influence Roll against them to perform this action. Exhaust a card.
Bottom Ability Rules: Mark a 5 foot by 5 foot area. You may teleport to that target area at any point.

Top Ability Rules: Exhaust a card. Summon a doorway. You may at any point summon another doorway. If both doorways are up then willing beings can walk through one to come out the other.
Bottom Ability Rules: Discard a card. Create a 10 foot by 10 foot by 10 foot box that is hollow over a space. Its walls are 1 foot thick. It has 50 hitpoints.

Top Ability Rules: Push a willing Target up to 25 feet in a direction. If the Target is an unwilling Enemy then you must succeed an influence roll against them to perform this action.
Bottom Ability Rules: Pull a willing Target in your direction up to 25 feet. If the Target is an unwilling Enemy you must succeed an Influence check against them to perform this action.

Top Ability Rules: Set your life total to X. You cannot take damage from attacks.
Bottom Ability Rules: Double all Defense Values you make. You cannot perform any Attack Actions.

Top Ability Rules: At the beginning of each of your turns you may mark a Target.
Bottom Ability Rules: You may remove a Mark from the Target to gain 20 feet of movement and play two additional actions this turn.

Top Ability Rules: Heal yourself and adjacent Targets up to X each.
Bottom Ability Rules: While active you can only play one action per turn. The Target may play one additional action per turn.

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: Influence   Remove X Marks from the Target
Top Ability Rules: If X is 1 or more then gain 50 feet of movement. If X is 2 or more then attack the Target twice if able. If X is 3 or more then return all cards from discard and draw a card.
Bottom Ability Rules: Reduce X Target's movement by 10 feet for each of their marks.

Top Ability Rules: If you deal damage then you may also Disable the enemy.
Bottom Ability Rules: If your attack would deal damage then you may instead disable the Target and take X damage. If they were already Disabled then they cannot remove this disabled affect.

Top Ability Rules: If damage is dealt then instead grapple Target and remove all contact tokens. For each contact token removed then perform the following: Attack Tokens add 1 Round to grapple duration; Defense Tokens disarm a weapon from Target; Influence Tokens reduce target's amount of actions by 1 next turn.
Bottom Ability Rules: If you deal damage and are at range Close then instead Grapple the Target and knock them Prone.

Top Ability Rules: If damage is deal then instead the Target gains 1 stack of Poison.
Bottom Ability Rules: If you deal damage to an enemy with an Attack they gain a stack of Poison.

Top Ability Rules: You gain a stack of Poison. Each time an enemy attacks you they gain a stack of Poison. After X rounds then heal up to X health.
Bottom Ability Rules: You may remove all poison stacks from a Target. If you do then gain X life at the start of your next X turns.

Top Ability Rules: At the start of your turn you may Exhaust a card from your deck and return a card from Discard to your hand.
Bottom Ability Rules: Discard a card and return three cards from discard to your hand.

Top Ability Rules: Discard a card. Create a 1 by (5 * X) wall that is 15 feet high. It has (10 * X) Health.
Bottom Ability Rules: Exhaust a card. Create a bomb consumable item that has an explosion radius of 10 feet and has an Attack Value of 20.

Top Ability Rules: You may have up to two more active cards in play.
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level    Y is your Active cards in play
Bottom Ability Rules: You have no limit on Active cards in play. Take Y damage at the end of your turn and discard a card.

Top Ability Rules: Add your Defense Die to your Attack Rolls.
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level    Y is the Excess value from your successful block
Bottom Ability Rules: If you block all damage from an attack then roll Y dice and the attacker takes 1 damage for every die with an even value.

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is the Excess value from your successful block
Top Ability Rules: If you block all damage from the next attack then you heal for X.
Bottom Ability Rules: Once per round if you block all damage from an attack then you may return a card from discard to your hand.

Top Ability Rules: If you deal damage to a marked enemy you may remove that mark and then each ally in range may make an attack against the Target.
Bottom Ability Rules: You may remove a mark on the Target at any time that they roll a value. If you do they must reroll that roll value; If they fail to succeed with this reroll then apply a mark to the Target.

Top Ability Rules: If you deal damage you may instead remove a mark from the Target. If you do then name one of their known actions. They cannot perform this action.
Bottom Ability Rules: If you succeed you may remove a mark from the Target. If you do then name one of their known actions. They cannot perform this action.

Top Ability Rules: If you succeed you may Mark Target. If the Target is within 10 feet of another enemy then that enemy is also Marked.
Bottom Ability Rules: If enemy is marked then add X to your attack roll. You may then remove Targets Mark and return this card to your hand.

Top Ability Rules: Roll X influence Rolls and set those Values aside. You may consume a token and add one of those Influence Values to an Influence Roll you are making and then remove it from the values you set aside.
Bottom Ability Rules: If the Target successfully blocks your attack then you may deal X damage to them.

Top Ability Rules: At the end of the next round roll 1d4 for every successful attack you made and deal that much damage to the Target.
Bottom Ability Rules: If your attack succeeds you may choose to deal no damage to the Target Enemy you attacked and instead deal that damage to another Target in range of that attack.

Top Ability Rules: The Target takes 1d4 damage.
Bottom Ability Rules: The Target takes Xd4 in damage.

Top Ability Rules: Add 1d4 to your Attack Value. You may choose to remove dice from your attack roll and then choose and remove that many dice from the Targets defense roll.
Bottom Ability Rules: You may remove one of your attack die from your attack roll; if you do then choose one of the enemies defense die and remove it from their defense roll and add it to your attack roll.

Top Ability Rules: You may remove all attack die from your attack roll. If you do then remove all defense die from Targets defense roll.
Bottom Ability Rules: You may remove dice from your attack roll. If you do then deal 1 damage to the Target for each die you removed.

Top Ability Rules: You may remove a mark to remove a influence die from their roll. If you succeed then the Target must make an attack against another Target if able.
Bottom Ability Rules: If you succeed you may Mark the Target. If you do they Roll Influence against another Target of your choice, and if they succeed that target gets a mark. This repeats until an influence roll fails or no more new targets exist

Top Ability Rules: If you deal damage to a Target then that Target gets -1 to all defense and attack rolls they make against you.
Bottom Ability Rules: You may move up to 20 feet if you are in your attack range of the Target after completing the movement.

Top Ability Rules: Remove a Mark from the Target and Discard a card. Whenever the Target rolls for a value you may swap one of their die with a 1d4.
Bottom Ability Rules: Discard a card. The Target must take an action to remove the net before they can use movement as an action.

Top Ability Rules: Each time you discard a card you may choose to instead loose X life and return that card to your hand.
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: Discard X cards Y is your Level
Bottom Ability Rules: Create and throw X explosives. Each one deals (X + Y) damage and damages anything within 5 feet from where they land.

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level   Y is your Influence Roll
Top Ability Rules: Summon a totem. It heals a Target within 10 feet for Y at the end of each Round.
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level Y is your Influence Roll
Bottom Ability Rules: Create a summon with Y health and attach it to Target. Whenever the Target makes a roll they may reduce the summons Life by 1 to add 1d4 to their roll value.
